profile.heading: Profile
profile.paragraph1: I'm Software Developer with almost a decade of experience in different fields within Web technologies, with a solid background in Front-End development, as well as experience in Back-End, and Mobile development.
profile.paragraph2: Led teams of developers with different levels of seniority in the past, into getting the most out of themselves, building web applications for different clients across the globe giving me a complete perspective of product development making me an integral professional focused on business understanding.
profile.paragraph3: With hands-on extensive experience in different technologies, frameworks, patterns and tech stacks, I'm well suited to understand the details of complex technical solutions, as well as propose, expand and build on top of them.
